name: Rocki Blocki
description:
Rocki your brain and unBlocki these puzzles.
Made for Mini Jam 101: Limit

Controls
- Click and drag + release to move blocks
- 'A', 'D' to move left and right
- 'W' or 'Spacebar' to jump
- 'E' to enter doors
- 'R' to restart current level

Credits
- Art by Moodypixels - https://twitter.com/moodypixels
- Programming by Daebak
